TopicTitle: Possible to recreate "the barn" in Kerbal Konstucts?

Articles.Content:
So I was thinking... I really like the barn version of KSC that everyone seemed to hate, and I just thought "maybe someone could recreate it in Kerbal Konstructs"

Now I am the worst when it comes to modding, modelling or doing any of the sort, so I was wondering if anyone could tell me if it's possible or even if they could make it (only if the modders want to)
